Name: B67
About the game: B67 is a top-down roguelite shooter that finds the player struggling to descend through 67 sub-levels of ever changing chaos. Manage your ammunition as much as your fears as you descend further into the unknown. Death may send your lifeless body back up the elevator shaft but fortunately your attained improved character statistics will permanently remain at your disposal. Most of these stat upgrades can be unlocked alongside an achievement... Guns are your only salvation against unrelenting foes. There are a multitude of different weapons available to the player, either from recently deceased corpses or by getting lucky with a ' shop ' floor. Every enemy killed gains you their bounty but be wary of saving too much before it's too late. Hell comes in many forms for different people. Personal torment waits for any soul that nears the lower levels. Try not to let the madness distract you as some rooms contain significantly stronger opponents.
